data.title: Art Walks in the summer
data.text: The Arts Commission sponsors art walks in downtown Toledo during the summer.  2014 Art Walks took place the 4th Thursday of each month, May - September, 6-9pm.  I attended the September one and had a great time.  They give you a map of the art on display in the city and they also offered a free guided tour, which we took advantage of.  Many people turned it into a kind of art walk/bar crawl as you walk around to see the art.  The picture attached is of the map they gave us.  I suppose if you are not there on a day when they are doing this, you can at least visit the art and/or galleries that are listed on the map!
